title: Mignon (MGS)
description: Despite his pretty face, Aillen has a harsh temper and also happens to have a crush on his Platoon Leader Dan, who occasionally looks out for him. One day, while passing by the barracks, Aillen finds Dan being disciplined by their superior, who is known for being old-fashioned and close-minded. Concerned for Danâ€™s well-being, Aillen goes to find him, bringing along some ointment in hopes of providing comfort. However, when he finds Dan, he is shocked to see him in an excited state from the pain...
author: Bboung Bbang Kkyu
